text: [Ej Pajomʙar] Ba mutaxallifon ʙigu: «Ba zudi ʙa muqoʙila ʙo guruhe cangovar faro xonda xohed sud, ki ononro az poj darovared, magar in ki taslim savand; agar itoat kuned, Alloh taolo podosi nakue ʙa sumo xohad dod; va agar hamcun guzasta sarpeci kuned, sumoro ʙo azoʙe dardnok mucozot xohad kard»
